directions: Combine pineapple juice, orange juice, and cranberry juice in a large pitcher and refrigerate, 8 hours to overnight.
Pour juice mixture into a punch bowl and slowly pour in lemon-lime soda; top with sherbet.
ingredients: 2 (2 liter) bottles lemon-lime soda (such as 7 Up®)
1 pint raspberry sherbet, or to taste
title: Raspberry Sherbet Punch
